issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
When I first packaged an application using Studio, the app icon did not appear in Xcode archive. We restarted Xcode but this had no effect. Some time later, the app icon started appearing, so this may be a one-off or intermittent issue.

I am unable to determine if this is a regression as it seems to affect only Xcode and may be an Apple issue.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Create a mobile project in TitaniumStudio
2) Right click on project, choose 'Publish' > 'Distribute - Apple iTunes Store'
3) Go through dialog window, choose correct options.
4) Push 'Publish' button.

Actual result:
There is no application icon image in opened Xcode organizer window.

Expected result:
In opened Xcode organizer window should be an application icon image.

Note:
After one of the subsequent times relaunching Xcode the problem didn't occur again.
fields.summary: iOS: Xcode (4.4)/OS X (10.8): There was no app icon in Xcode at first when running first packaging test
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.1.201207271312
Xcode (4.4)
Mountain Lion (OS X 10.8)

comments.body: Closing ticket due to time passed and lack of progress for a number of years. Please open a new ticket if there are any problems.
